import React from "react"; import {NavLink, useLocation} from 'react-router-dom' import {Button, Card, Container, Form, Row, Col} from 'react-bootstrap' import { LOGIN_ROUTE, REGISTRATION_ROUTE } from "../utils/consts"; const Auth = () => { const location = useLocation() const isLogin = location.pathname === LOGIN_ROUTE console.log(location) return (

{isLogin ? 'Авторизация' : "Регистрация"}

 Нет аккаунта?{" "} Зарегистрируйтесь! ); }; export default Auth;
